</author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim. co.uk/img/static/sys-images/Guardian/About/General/2012/8/21/1345564538828/HMS-Triumphs-cramped-cond-010.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none" style="width ：220像素； height: 132px;" />;<br />;描述了英国核潜艇上的生活，以及执行官和船员的见解。文章强调了对新人的实际指导、船员之间的友情和责任与船上操作核反应堆有关。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#life-on-board-a-british-nuclear-submarine-2012" target="_blank">;[summary] </a>; <id>;https:// generated.photos / human-generator / </ id>; <更新>; 2023-08-23T15：54：48.064257Z </更新>; <link href =“https:// generated.photos/ human-generator/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https:// static. generated.photos/vue-static/ human-generator/opengraph.png" style="width: 220px; height: 115px;" />;<br />;利用AI在线生成不存在的人物，更换服装并修改面部和身体特征。下载生成的不同姿势的人物。 <a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#ai-real-time- human-full-body-photo-generator" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item ?id=37237583" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <标题type="text">;HashiCorp 切换到 BSL 显示了对开放特许公司的需求</stitle>; <id>;https://opencoreventures.com/blog/2023-08-23-hashicorp-switching-bsl-shows-need- for-open-charter-companies/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T18:54:48.064987Z</更新>; <link href="https://opencoreventures.com/blog/2023-08-23- hashicorp-switching-bsl-shows-need-for-open-charter-companies/"/>; <author>; <name>;sytse</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=sytse </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opencoreventures.com/blog/2023-08-23-hashicorp-switching-bsl-shows-need-for-open -charter-companies/avg-time-ipo-switch.png" style="width: 220px; height: 137px;" />;<br />;HashiCorp 是最新一家从开源转向非竞争许可的公司，追随知名开源公司的趋势。这种趋势引起了对商业开源软件的不信任社区呼吁公司通过开放章程承担责任。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#hashicorp-switching-to-bsl-shows-a-need-for-open- Charter-companies" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37239979" target="_blank">;[评论]</a >;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;Nvidia 公布 2024 财年第二季度财务业绩</ stitle>; <id>;https://nvidianews.nvidia.com/news/nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-second-quarter-fiscal-2024</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T20:54:48.065925 Z</updated>; <link href="https://nvidianews.nvidia.com/news/nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-second-quarter-fiscal-2024"/>; <作者>; <名称>;electriclove< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=electriclove</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.nvidia. com/content/dam/en-zz/Solutions/navigation/intelligent-machines.png" style="width: 220px; height: 125px;" />;<br />;NVIDIA公布第二季度营收为135.1亿美元，同比增长101%。该公司还宣布了在人工智能和游戏领域的合作伙伴关系和新产品。 <a href=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/#nvidia-announces-financial-results-for-second-quarter-fiscal-2024" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https:// /news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37241487" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io /feed.xml">; <title type="text">;SeaGlass：全市 IMSI-Catcher 检测 (2017)</stitle>; <id>;https://seaglass.cs.washington.edu/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T16：54：48.066845Z </更新>; <link href =“https://seaglass.cs.washington.edu/”/>; <作者>; <名称>;卡尔兹特</名称>; <uri>; https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=karlzt</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://seaglass-web.s3.amazonaws.com/ wp-content/uploads/sensor_triplet.png" style="width: 220px; height: 188px;" />;<br />;SeaGlass 是一个旨在测量整个城市 IMSI 捕获器使用情况的系统。它收集手机信号塔信号数据以检测 IMSI 捕获器签名。<a href="https://hackernews. betacat.io/#seaglass-city-wide-imsi-catcher-detection-2017" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id =37238254" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type= “text">;显示 HN：Dataherald AI – 自然语言到 SQL 引擎</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Dataherald/dataherald</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T18:54:48.069394Z </更新>; <link href="https://github.com/Dataherald/dataherald"/>; <作者>; <名称>;aazo11</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id =aazo11</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets.com/86d198e2c46041f3f7c5c5307c86e169534f40104c6d8682e17188a6266d85fa/Dataherald/dataherald" style="width: 220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Dataherald 是一种自然语言到 SQL 的引擎，专为针对结构化数据进行企业级问答而构建。它允许您从数据库设置一个 API，该 API 可以用简单的英语回答问题. <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-dataherald-ai-natural-language-to-sql-engine" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37240363" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;我最喜欢的素数生成器</stitle>; <id>;https://eli.thegreenplace.net/2023/my-favorite-prime- number-generator/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T14:54:48.070214Z</更新>; <link href="https://eli.thegreenplace.net/2023/my-favorite-prime-number-生成器/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;mfrw </名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=mfrw</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">; <img src="https://eli.thegreenplace.net/images/2023/eratosthenes-animation-wikipedia.gif" style="width: 220px; height: 183px;" />;<br />;很多年前，我重新发布了一个 Stack Overflow 答案，其中包含 Python 代码，用于生成一个可能无限的素数序列的简洁素数筛函数。从那时起，我就使用了此代码多次 - 主要是因为它简短而清晰。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#my-favorite-prime-number-generator" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37236099" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;果仁蜜饼的粘性历史</stitle>; <id>;https://www.smithsonianmag.com/travel/the-sticky -history-of-baklava-180982771/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T18:54:48.071453Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.smithsonianmag.com/travel/the-sticky -history-of-baklava-180982771/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;棱镜</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=prismatic</uri>; </作者>; <内容类型=“html”>; <img src =“https://th-thumbnailer.cdn-si-edu.com/pHmekEMabP75AX2-WYyawo6bv_Q=/1000x750/filters:no_upscale():focal(1000x667:1001x668)/https: //tf-cmsv2-smithsonianmag-media.s3.amazonaws.com/filer_public/2a/f3/2af35344-f0b9-43ec-96b3-6e57404cebdf/gettyimages-1062149342.jpg" style="width: 220px;高度：165px;" />;<br />;Efkan Güllü 家族从事果仁蜜饼生意已经超过五代了。果仁蜜饼的起源可以追溯到古代，但我们今天所知的果仁蜜饼最早的版本是在大约500 年前，奥斯曼帝国时期。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#the-sticky-history-of-baklava" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37232074" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https:// /hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;将 dir=“auto” 添加到您的输入和文本区域</stitle>; <id>;https://mough.xyz/312/psa-添加目录自动到您的输入和文本区域</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T10:54:48.072016Z</更新>; <link href="https://mough.xyz/312 /psa-add-dir-auto-to-your-inputs-and-textareas"/>; <作者>; <名称>;ducaale</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=ducaale </uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://s3.amazonaws.com/sn-listed/letters/v2/big/M.png" style="width: 220 像素； height: 220px;" />;<br />;向笔记应用添加从右到左的语言支持 (RTL) 似乎并不简单，需要字符解析或第三方库。但是，找到了一个简单的解决方案：添加 dir ="auto" 到文本区域。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#add-dir-auto-to-your-inputs-and-textareas" target="_blank">;[summary]< /a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37233902" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base ="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;基于 Spotify 播放列表的编程语言的解释器</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/ h313/spet</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T19:54:48.074164Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/h313/spet"/>; <作者>; <name>;pyinstallwoes </name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=pyinstallwoes</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://opengraph.githubassets .com/f3c58e2bfa4da290538a73694d800f0ea73e71ddd172a2b1af87abcccb46bc99/h313/spet" style="宽度：220px; height: 110px;" />;<br />;Spet 是基于 Spotify 播放列表的编程语言的解释器。它从上到下读取播放列表，并使用歌曲的各种属性来定义行为。该解释器需要 Spotify 高级帐户连接 API。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-interpreter-for-a-programming-language-based-on-spotify-playlists" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37231347" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml :base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;薪资谈判中的常见错误</stitle>; <id>;https://interviewing.io/blog/sabotage -salary-negotiation-before-even-start</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T18:54:48.075311Z</更新>; <link href="https://interviewing.io/blog/sabotage-salary- Negotiation-before-even-start"/>; <author>; <name>;eamonnm</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=eamonnm</uri>; </author>; <内容类型="html">;<img src="https://interviewing.io/static/images/FooterImg.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 178px;" />;<br />;本文讨论了人们在开始使用谈判服务之前在薪资谈判中常犯的两个错误。它强调了与招聘人员交谈时处于“被动信息收集”模式的重要性并强调了候选人和招聘人员之间的利益不一致。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#common-mistakes-in-salary-negotiation" target="_blank">;[summary]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37239747" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https ://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;对迷走神经刺激的科学兴趣与日俱增</stitle>; <id>;https://www.theguardian.com/society/2023/ 8 月 23 日/抑郁症、肥胖、酗酒的关键以及为什么迷走神经对科学家来说如此令人兴奋</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T10： 54:48.075905Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.theguardian.com/society/2023/aug/23/the-key-to-depression-obesity-alcoholism-and-more-why-the -vagus-nerve-is-so-exciting-to-scientists"/>; <author>; <name>;acallaghan</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=acallaghan</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://i.guim.co.uk/img/media/61f26c42d739fd690f0ef7d664064842e3412416/0_0_2832_3806/master/2832.jpg?width=445&dpr=1&s=none “样式=”宽度：220px; height: 296px;" />;<br />;迷走神经是大脑与心脏、肺和腹部器官之间的双向通讯通道。它有助于控制不自主的过程，是副交感神经系统的一部分。科学兴趣迷走神经刺激正在增长，研究调查了其治疗各种疾病的潜力。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#forming-scientific-interest-in-vagus-nerve-stimulation" target=" _blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37233977" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </ entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;基因数据库中的人们经常意外地拥有共同的 DNA 片段</stitle>; < id>;https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/08/genics-makes-some-people-more-likely-to-participate-in-genic-studies/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T19 ：54：48.076444Z </更新>; <link href =“https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/08/genics-makes-some-people-more-likely-to-participate-in-genic-studies/ "/>; <author>; <name>;bookofjoe</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bookofjoe</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src =“https://cdn.arstechnica.net/wp-content/uploads/2023/08/GettyImages-1285352700-800x560.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 154px;" />;<br />;由于确定偏差，基因研究可能会出现偏差，即所研究的样本不能代表目标人群。牛津大学大数据研究所的 Stefania Benonisdottir 和 Augustine Kong 开发了一种技术来确定如果基因研究使用参与者的基因存在偏见。他们发现基因贡献会影响参与基因研究的倾向。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#people-in- a-genic-database-have-segments-of-dna-in-common-unexpectedly-often" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/ item?id=37229686" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; < title type="text">;MacWhisper：在 Mac 上转录音频文件</stitle>; <id>;https://goodsnooze.gumroad.com/l/macwhisper</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T12:54： 48.076992Z</updated>; <link href="https://goodsnooze.gumroad.com/l/macwhisper"/>; <作者>; <name>;cristoperb</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com /user?id=cristoperb</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://public-files.gumroad.com/6cw1xwexmi68zzhwyv38qmbp2n2l" style="width: 220px; height: 138px;" />;<br />;使用 OpenAI 最先进的转录技术 Whisper 快速轻松地将音频文件转录为文本。无论您是录制会议、讲座还是其他重要音频，MacWhisper 都可以快速、轻松地将音频文件转录为文本。准确地将您的音频文件转录为文本。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#macwhisper-transcribe-audio-files-on-your-mac" target="_blank">;[summary]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37228821" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：使用 Rust 和 Python 快速向量相似性</stitle>; <id>;https://github.com/Dicklesworthstone/ fast_vector_similarity</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T13:54:48.077489Z</更新>; <link href="https://github.com/Dicklesworthstone/fast_vector_similarity"/>; <作者>; <名称>;特征值</名称>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=eigenvalue</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://user-images.githubusercontent .com/35050222/262415280-a3445767-f574-4627-808a-30c347271757.png" style="宽度：220px; height: 178px;" />;<br />;快速向量相似度库旨在提供向量之间各种相似度度量的高效计算。它适用于数据分析、机器学习和统计等任务，其中测量向量之间的关系向量是必不可少的。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-fast-vector-similarity-using-rust-and-python" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a >; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37234887" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base=" https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;在 macOS ARM64 上探索 Windows XP</stitle>; <id>;https://milen.me/writings/exploring-windows- xp-on-macos-arm64/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T16:54:48.078013Z</更新>; <link href="https://milen.me/writings/exploring-windows-xp- on-macos-arm64/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;milen</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=milen</uri>; </author>; <内容类型= “html”>; <img src =“https://r2-cloudflare.milen.me/images/writings/windows-xp-on-macos-arm64/setup_06.jpg”样式=“宽度：220px; height: 185px;" />;<br />;使用QEMU可以在ARM64 Mac上运行Windows XP。作者安装了XP和各种经典软件，用截图记录了过程。<a href="https://hackernews .betacat.io/#exploring-windows-xp-on-macos-arm64" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id= 37238306" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type=" text">;一份极其详细的 SSH 指南（但仅限于我认为有用的内容）</stitle>; <id>;https://grahamhelton.com/blog/ssh-cheatsheet/</id>; <updated>;2023-08- 23T18:54:48.079043Z</updated>; <link href="https://grahamhelton.com/blog/ssh-cheatsheet/"/>; <作者>; <name>;weeha</name>; <uri>;https:// news.ycombinator.com/user?id=weeha</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://grahamhelton.com/Pasted-image-20230820222328.png" style= “宽度：220px； height: 182px;" />;<br />;SSH端口转发可能是一个理解起来比较复杂的概念，但却是遍历网络的有力工具。本文提供了SSH端口转发的全面指南，包括本地端口转发、远程端口转发转发、动态端口转发以及使用 SSH 跳过主机。还解释了 SSH 代理转发及其优点。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#an-excruciatingly-detailed-guide-to-ssh -but-only-the-things-i-find-useful" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37240187" 目标="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;天然养蜂人是养蜂业的激进反对者</stitle>; <id>;https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2023/08/28/is-beekeeping-wrong</id>; <updated>;2023-08-23T14 :54:48.079547Z</updated>; <link href="https://www.newyorker.com/magazine/2023/08/28/is-beekeeping-wrong"/>; <作者>; <name>;fortran77</name >; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=fortran77</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://media.newyorker.com/照片/64de67f53b391db87dffd19d/master/w_2560%2Cc_limit/230828_r42842.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 276px;" />;<br />;自然养蜂人是养蜂业的激进反对者。他们认为主流养蜂业已经迷失方向，主张采取更加放手的养蜂方式。 <a href="https:// hackernews.betacat.io/#natural-beekeepers-are-the-radical-dissenters-of-apiculture" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com /item?id=37224936" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;显示 HN：Gentrace – 生成式 AI 的评估和可观察性</stitle>; <id>;https://gentrace.ai</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T16:54:48.080678Z </更新>; <link href="https://gentrace.ai"/>; <作者>; <name>;dsaffy</name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=dsaffy</ uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://gentrace.ai/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fss-6.6bf15347.png&w=3840&q=75 “样式=”宽度：220px; height: 115px;" />;<br />;停止在电子表格中使用人类。使用人工智能和启发式评估器自动评估回归和幻觉。监控生产中的速度和成本。深入查看输入、输出和评估器分数特定世代。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#show-hn-gentrace-evaluation-and-observability-for-generative-ai" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; </content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;使用光子量子纠缠构建的图像</stitle>; < id>;https://phys.org/news/2023-08-visualizing-mysterious-quantum-entanglement-photons.amp</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T10:54:48.081251Z</更新>; <链接href="https://phys.org/news/2023-08-visualizing-mysterious-quantum-entanglement-photons.amp"/>; <author>; <name>;danboarder</name>; <uri>;https://news .ycombinator.com/user?id=danboarder</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://scx2.b-cdn.net/gfx/news/2023/visualizing -the-myster.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 101px;" />;<br />;渥太华大学的研究人员开发了一种实时可视化纠缠光子波函数的技术，该技术具有推进量子技术的潜力。该方法速度更快、可扩展性更强比以前的技术，它可用于改进量子态表征、量子通信和量子成像。<a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#image-constructed-using-quantum-entanglement-of-光子" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; <a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37231148" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;< /content>; </entry>; <entry xml:base="https://hackernews.betacat.io/feed.xml">; <title type="text">;构建手动键盘的完整指南 (2020) </stitle>; <id>;https://www.crackedthecode.co/a-complete-guide-to-building-a-hand-wired-keyboard/</id>; <更新>;2023-08-23T07:54： 48.081753Z</更新>; <link href="https://www.crackedthecode.co/a-complete-guide-to-building-a-hand-wired-keyboard/"/>; <作者>; <名称>;bfm< /name>; <uri>;https://news.ycombinator.com/user?id=bfm</uri>; </author>; <content type="html">;<img src="https://www.crackedthecode. co/a-complete-guide-to-building-a-hand-wired-keyboard/full-keyboard-with-leds.jpg" style="width: 220px; height: 101px;" />;<br />;最近，作者想要制作一款定制的机械键盘，并决定自己动手。他们研究了不同的键盘开关，最终确定了 MX Blue 和 MX Red 开关的组合。他们还需要二极管、键盘壳、键帽、微控制器和其他材料。他们使用 KLE 和 swillkb 设计和定制键盘，然后制造板材和外壳，最后安装按键开关和二极管，完成构建。 <a href="https://hackernews.betacat.io/#a-complete-guide-to-building-a-hand-wired-keyboard-2020" target="_blank">;[摘要]</a>; < a href="https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=37220604" target="_blank">;[评论]</a>;</content>; </entry>; </feed>;
